AUsage: Il parle à son ami (He's talking to his friend)
DeUsage: Il parle de son ami (He's talking about his friend)
AvecUsage: Il parle avec son ami (He's talking with his friend)

ProlativeUsage: Je pense partir avant la fin (I’m planning to leave before the end)
AUsage: Je pense à mes enfants (I think about my children) (to have in mind)
